'''Heat-Quelling Soup''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Jade Fruit Soup]] with [[Baizhu]]. The [[recipe]] for Jade Fruit Soup is obtainable from [[Herbalist Gui]] at [[Bubu Pharmacy]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

'''Heat-Quelling Soup''' increases all party members' Healing Bonus by '''25'''% for 300s. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
